org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: Roam, Volumetric Building Companies, and Brandywine Realty Trust operate in the real estate and workspace solutions industry. Roam provides collaborative coworking spaces, while Volumetric Building Companies specializes in modular housing construction. Brandywine Realty Trust focuses on real estate investment and management.

overview_description.description:
Roam offers a collaborative coworking space that enhances the meeting experience for the modern workforce.

Their mission is to cater to individuals on the go, providing them with an enhanced means to connect, work efficiently, and foster business growth. Consequently, they have developed the most comprehensive off-site work and meeting center available anywhere, surpassing all others in terms of comprehensiveness.
